overview: Take the Mike is about the sexual adventures of music producer David El Moreno at a major record label. At first he's tired of having so many loose girls and groupies hanging around, trying to further their careers through hot sex, but eventually he decides to make the most of his position of power and gives them all a very thorough casting! Don't miss the porn-musical side of stars like Jordanne Kali, Bibi Noel, Erica Fontes, Amarna Miller, Eris Maximo and Anissa Kate in this ground breaking reality-cum-comedy.
title: Take the Mike
